ygData.subject: RE: [rest-discuss] GET Events Protocol (was HttpEvents as currently contemplated areextraneous)
ygData.msgSnippet: You can t use chunks as message delimeters because proxies may (must?) strip out chunk encoding before the data is passed to the client.

You can't use chunks as message delimeters because proxies may (must?) strip out
chunk encoding before the data is passed to the client.

> Note, if HTTP intermediaries decide to group
> chunks in awkward ways, that is not a problem with
> HTTP.  It is a problem with the intermediaries
> implementation.
>
> -Alex-
